column4: So eh, ubuntu 'magically' mounted my windows share for me. But eh, where did it mount it? Cause I'm trying to browse to it in filezilla but it's not under /mnt or /media :<
run "mount" and look for the NTFS/FAT thing that is mounted (assuming it is automagically mounted).
well it's actually a samba share on a linux server. And mount doesn't show it mounted.
my bookmark under Places is a smb: link
